text: The official pronunciation is "The letter V six times"
author: Drackyen

text:
https://games.avclub.com/avc-at-gdc-10-an-interview-with-vvvvvv-creator-terry-1798219375
Terry Cavanagh (the creator of the game): I think the reason (the question of how to pronounce VVVVVV) came up so often is it’s so much fun to try and pronounce it. I call it “V.” I called it “V” during development, but I encourage any sort of funny pronunciation so V-V-V-V-V-V is fine, as is vuh-vuh-vuh or trying to guess how many V’s are in it. Some people call it “Six V’s,” which is probably easiest.

author: KholdSeraph89

text: Very entertaining platformer for 5 bucks. Great mix of unique and old school gameplay, all with an awesome chiptuney soundtrack. There's one optional sequence that took me about 2 hours to finally get to the end and get the trinket, I think it was the hardest thing in the game... 10 more minutes and I couldn't say what would've happened to my keyboard !
author: SupraDarky
